result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
Clerked by SM. 
Defendant William L Loftis in court with attorney John Gerard Hinde.  Defendant William L Loftis in custody.  Angela Lynn Beranek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
15CF190, 15CM134, 15CT98, 15CM139 & 15CF191

Agreement.  Attorney Hinde relates to date 101 days jail credit.

15CM134 - Court questions defendant.  Defendant pleads guilty to count 1 as charged.  Court accepts and finds guilty.  Count 2 - dismiss and read-in.
15CF191 - Court amends count 1 to substantial battery 940.19(2) - Class I Felony - defendant pleads guilty.  Court accepts and finds guilty of amended count 1.  Count 2 and 3 are dismissed and read-in.

15CT98 - Court dismisses and reads-in.
15CF190 - Court dismisses and reads-in.
15CM139 - Court dismisses and reads in.

Order for PSI.
Bond revoked.

Both 15CM134 & 15CF191 will be sentenced at the same time.

  Sentencing hearing scheduled for October 22, 2015 at 04:00 pm.

clerked by RWinger
Defendant William L Loftis in court with attorney John Gerard Hinde.  Defendant William L Loftis in custody.  Angela Lynn Beranek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
THIS COVERS 15CT98, 15CM134, 15CM139,15CF190, 15CF191.

All other files to track.  Plea hearing scheduled for July 29, 2015 at 02:00 pm.

THIS COVERS 15CM134, 15CM139 AND 15CT98. All files to track with his CF cases set for 6/17/15 at 2:00 p.m. with Branch I.  Plea hearing scheduled for June 17, 2015 at 02:00 pm.

(clerked by AP)
Defendant William L Loftis in court with attorney John Gerard Hinde.  Defendant William L Loftis in custody.  Angela Lynn Beranek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

THIS COURT RECORD COVERS 15CM134 AND 15CM139

Plea of Not Guilty to all charges in both above cases.
Both above cases set for plea date 6/03/15 at 2:00 PM


15CM139:  Atty. Hinde moves for bond modification from cash bond to signature bond.
State objects to bond modification.
Court modifies bond to $100 cash bond.  All conditions of previous bond to remain in full force and effect.


  Plea hearing scheduled for June 3, 2015 at 02:00 pm.

Defendant shall be fingerprinted at the Barron County Sheriff's Dept., if not already done.
If represented by the Public Defender and does not have a phone, must contact the Public Defender weekly at 715-537-1191.
Must have no contact with Courtney F. or her residence.

4/22/2015: THIS BOND IS AMENDED FROM A $250.00 CASH BOND TO A $100.00 CASH BOND. ALL OTHER CONDITIONS REMAIN IN FULL FORCE AND EFFECT.

Defendant shall be fingerprinted at the Barron County Sheriff's Dept., if not already done.
If represented by the Public Defender and does not have a phone, must contact the Public Defender weekly at 715-537-1191.

Defendant William L Loftis in court with attorney John Gerard Hinde.  Defendant William L Loftis in custody.  Joseph M. Schieffer appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant qualifies for PD representation. Defendant waives formal reading of Complaint and pleads NG. Court withdraws NG plea and adjourns initial until tomorrow morning to track with his other case.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for April 22, 2015 at 10:00 am.
